stk.ga module¶

class stk.ga.GAHistory(fitness_calculator, log_file, progress_dump, database_dump)¶

Bases: object

Deals with logging the GA’s history.

fitness_calculator¶

The FitnessCalculator used to calculate fitness values.

Type:FitnessCalculator
progress_dump¶

Toggles dumping of progress.

Type:bool
database_dump¶

Toggles dumping of dp_pop.

Type:bool
progress¶

A population where each subpopulation is a generation of the GA.

Type:GAPopulation
db_pop¶

A population which holds every molecule made by the GA.

Type:GAPopulation or NoneType
db(mols)¶

Adds mols to db_pop.

Only molecules not already present are added.

Parameters:mols (GAPopulation) – A group of molecules made by the GA.
Returns:None
Return type:NoneType
dump()¶

Creates output files for the GA run.

The following files are created:

progress.log
This file holds the progress of the GA in text form. Each generation is reprented by the names of the molecules and their key and fitness.
progress.json
A population dump file holding progress. Only made if progress_dump is True.
database.json
A population dump file holding every molecule made by the GA. Only made if db_pop is not None.
static log_file_content(progress)¶
log_pop(logger, pop)¶

Writes pop to logger at level INFO.

Parameters:
  • logger (Logger) – The logger object recording the GA.
  • pop (GAPopulation) – A population which is to be added to the log.
Returns:

None
Return type:

NoneType
pop_log_content(pop, underline)¶
stk.ga.ga_run(input_file)¶

Runs the GA.
